title.value: The morphogenesis of selection hybrids (Vacciniaceae S.F.Gray) in vitro culture
Морфогенез селекционных гибридов (сем. Vacciniaceae S.F.Gray) в культуре in vitro

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Kutas, E.N., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Central Botanical Garden
Goretskaya, A.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Central Botanical Garden

abstract.value: Morphogenesis of cell culture appears a complicated multi-factor process, depending on type and physiological status of explant, nutritive medium composition (vitamins, carbohydrates, hormone additives), cultivation conditions and other factors. The article presents the analysis of optimal composition of nutritive mediums for the induction of morphogenesis of selection hybrids of Vacciniaceae S.F. gray. The researches, carried out by different authors and conducted to the question, are analyzed. Composition of nutritive mediums for evaluation of morphogenesis of selection hybrids of Vacciniaceae family is investigated. Forthputting of the plants depending on nutritive medium's composition is analyzed. Morphogenesis of selection hybrids depending on nutritive medium on the example of Vaccinium vitis-idaea x Oxycoccus palastris is researched. Optimal composition of nutritive medium, appropriate for morphogenesis, is described. Principal opportunity of regeneration of selection hybrids of Vacciniaceae S.F. gray is shown.
